actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: To make appropriations for fiscal year 1994 for a community adjustment and economic diversification program in connection with Homestead Air Force Base, Florida.
short_title: Homestead, Florida, Community Adjustment and Economic Diversification Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 1994

summary.text: Homestead, Florida, Community Adjustment and Economic Diversification Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 1994 - Makes appropriations for FY 1994 for operation and maintenance, defense agencies, for planning and carrying out a community adjustment and economic diversification program in connection with Homestead Air Force Base, Florida.

titles.title: Homestead, Florida, Community Adjustment and Economic Diversification Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 1994
To make appropriations for fiscal year 1994 for a community adjustment and economic diversification program in connection with Homestead Air Force Base, Florida.
